/usr/local/cuda-12.5/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -g --generate-code=arch=compute_86,code=[compute_86,sm_86] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/LlamaCtxAttn.dir/context_attention.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/LlamaCtxAttn.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.5/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lconcat_kv -lfused_transpose_and_remv_pad -lmask_softmax -lcudart -lcublas  -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
